resources.string: On landing the role of Spiderman:\n It\'s just about exploring and telling a story that I\'ve cared about since I was 4 years old - that I see as belonging to everyone and no one. I com- pare it to how we don\'t get bored of seeing diff- erent people play Hamlet, and we don\'t get bored of seeing different people play King Lear. I consider this role as the same kind of mythology as those roles. There are modern myths, and I feel like this is just another generation and a legacy that will hopefully go on forever meaning so much to other skinny boys throughout the ages.
